column4: crap I already forgot that link, after I boot my computer will you give me that link again PatrickDickey ?
l3top I may come back and ask you again once I get it booted up is that ok? you guys are helping me keep my computer, I didn't want to give it up for a freaking month
ok thank you guys so much
I think PatrickDickey does not understand that you cannot boot windows... no that cannot be done from the live disk... we are just using the live disk to rule out a bad drive
you are going to probably have to boot into a windows disk and fixmbr/fixboot from the recovery console ONCE a bad drive is ruled out.
